result.execSummary:
The defendant Gary Melvin Gores was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gary Melvin Gores

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: c: DA, Defendant, Atty Kucinski, Jail and SCSO. mw

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Rohan, ADA:  Michael Edward Nieskes   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  Gary Melvin Gores appeared in custody, via telephone. Includes: 15CM377 and 15TR3001. Case called at 3:42 pm. Atty. Kucinski states DE wishes to plead guilty to the misdemeanor charge and receive credit for time served. DE updates Court regarding pending charges in Barron County. Atty. Nieskes states DE is to receive credit for 3 days time served.   Crt reviews Plea Quest /Waiver of Rights and State's burden of proof w/ DF. Both ADA and Atty stipulate to facts in the deputy's report that support the charge DF has pled to. Crt finds DF waives constitutional rights and enters plea freely, knowingly and voluntarily. DE enters Guilty plea in 15CM377. Court accepts plea and adjudicates DE guilty in 15CM377. ADA Nieskes and Atty. Kucinski give sentencing recommendations. DE makes statement. Court dismisses 15TR3001. Court Orders in 15CM377:
3 days jail with 3 days credit for time served
Court suspends fine/costs
DE advised of right to appeal
Adjourned 3:52 pm

Letter from Defendant requesting to appear by phone at Plea Hearing on 11-5-2015. 
Per EJL: DENIED 11-4-2015.
Attorney's notified and Defendant will appear by phone per kes 11/4/15. eif

Prior: 59 Frank Street, Roberts, WI 54023 United States
per attorney in court. lmw

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  Gary Melvin Gores did not appear.  Court called at 9:42 a.m.  Includes case 15CM377 & 15TR3001.  Attorney Kucinski advises the court he believes the DE to be in the Barron County Jail.  There is an agreement.  Set out for Plea Hearing.  DE approved to appear by phone for 11/05/15 plea hearing.  Court adjourned.  lw  Plea hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Rohan, ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  Gary Melvin Gores appeared. Set for STC 15CM377 and Intake for 15TR3001. Atty. Kucinski states DEF is in jail in Barron County. ADA McKinley requests status be set.  Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Status conference on August 19, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Michael E. Nieskes,   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Gary Melvin Gores appeared from jail.   Includes 15CM377 (Init), 10CM191, 06CF222 & 10FO6 (PayH). Court confirms address. QUASH WARRANTS on payments. Fines to trail 15CM377.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on 15CM377.  Waives speedy trial.  ADA Nieskes is requesting $500.00 CB, Atty Kucinski argues. Defendant believes he owes about $200.00 after tax intercept (ck files/payments).  Status conference scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 10:30 am.
